title: Hannah Otto Explores Failure and FKTs in New Film ‘Kokopelli Strong’
content:
The professional gravel and marathon MTB racer set a FKT on the Kokopelli Trail in May after missing the record by 15 minutes last October.

Read the full article at Hannah Otto Explores Failure and FKTs in New Film ‘Kokopelli Strong’ on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
